products.name: Cloud Manager Basic
products.description: Entry-level cloud infrastructure management solution for small businesses and startups.

features.name: Resource Monitoring
features.description: Monitor CPU, memory, storage, and network usage across your cloud infrastructure.

features.name: Basic Alerts
features.description: Set up simple threshold-based alerts for critical resources.

features.name: Infrastructure Visualization
features.description: Basic dashboard showing your cloud resources and their relationships.

features.name: 5 User Accounts
features.description: Support for up to 5 user accounts with basic role permissions.

limitations: Email support only with 24-hour response time
products.target_audience: Startups and small teams with basic cloud management needs

products.name: Cloud Manager Pro
products.description: Comprehensive cloud management platform for mid-sized businesses with growing infrastructure needs.

features.name: Advanced Monitoring
features.description: Detailed monitoring including custom metrics, application-level insights, and historical trending.

features.name: Smart Alerting
features.description: AI-powered alerts with anomaly detection and correlation analysis.

features.name: Cost Optimization
features.description: Identifies cost-saving opportunities and provides rightsizing recommendations.

features.name: Automation Workflows
features.description: Create simple automation routines for common tasks and remediation.

features.name: Multi-Cloud Support
features.description: Support for AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud Platform.

features.name: 20 User Accounts
features.description: Support for up to 20 user accounts with advanced role-based permissions.

limitations: Email and chat support with 12-hour response time

products.name: Cloud Manager Enterprise
products.description: Enterprise-grade cloud governance and management solution for large organizations.

features.name: Comprehensive Monitoring Suite
features.description: Full-stack monitoring with custom dashboards, advanced analytics, and ML-driven insights.

features.name: Predictive Analysis
features.description: ML-powered forecasting for resource usage, costs, and potential issues.

features.name: Advanced Automation
features.description: Create complex multi-step workflows with conditional logic and approval processes.

features.name: Policy Governance
features.description: Define and enforce organizational policies across your entire cloud ecosystem.

features.name: Security Compliance
features.description: Continuous compliance monitoring with support for major standards (HIPAA, PCI, SOC2, etc.).

features.name: Disaster Recovery
features.description: Automated backup, recovery, and failover management.

features.name: Unlimited User Accounts
features.description: Support for unlimited users with granular, custom role definitions.

features.name: API Access
features.description: Full API access for custom integrations and extensions.

products.target_audience: Large enterprises with complex cloud environments and strict governance requirements

products.name: Container Sentinel Standard
products.description: Container security and management solution for Kubernetes environments.

features.name: Container Vulnerability Scanning
features.description: Automatically scan container images for vulnerabilities and malware.

features.name: Runtime Security
features.description: Monitor and protect containers during runtime with behavior analysis.

features.name: Kubernetes Integration
features.description: Seamless integration with Kubernetes for policy enforcement and visibility.

features.name: Image Registry Scanning
features.description: Scan private and public registries for vulnerable images.

features.name: Compliance Checks
features.description: Verify containers against CIS benchmarks and security best practices.

limitations: Support for major Kubernetes distributions only

products.name: Container Sentinel Enterprise
products.description: Enterprise-grade container security and governance platform for large-scale Kubernetes deployments.

features.name: Advanced Container Security
features.description: Comprehensive container security with zero-day threat protection and custom policy enforcement.

features.name: Multi-Cluster Management
features.description: Centralized management for multiple Kubernetes clusters across environments.

features.name: Service Mesh Integration
features.description: Integration with Istio, Linkerd, and other service mesh technologies.

features.name: Advanced Network Policies
features.description: Create and enforce sophisticated network policies with traffic visualization.

features.name: GitOps Workflow Integration
features.description: Seamless integration with CI/CD pipelines and GitOps workflows.

features.name: Advanced RBAC Management
features.description: Sophisticated role-based access control with detailed audit logging.

limitations: Complex setup recommended with professional services
products.target_audience: Large enterprises with extensive Kubernetes deployments across multiple environments

products.name: DataProtect Standard
products.description: Cloud-native data protection and backup solution for critical workloads.

features.name: Automated Backups
features.description: Schedule automated backups for cloud workloads and databases.

features.name: Point-in-Time Recovery
features.description: Restore to specific points in time with granular recovery options.

features.name: Cross-Region Replication
features.description: Replicate backups across regions for disaster recovery.

features.name: Encryption
features.description: End-to-end encryption for data in transit and at rest.

features.name: Retention Policies
features.description: Define custom retention policies for different data types.

limitations: Support for major database engines only
products.target_audience: Organizations needing reliable backup for cloud workloads

addons.name: Training Package
addons.description: Comprehensive training for your team on TechSolutions products.
addons.details: 5-day training program for up to 10 team members, covering product features, best practices, and administration.

addons.name: Professional Services
addons.description: Expert assistance with setup, configuration, and optimization.
addons.details: Dedicated solutions architect to help with implementation, migration, and advanced configuration.

addons.name: Premium Support
addons.description: 24/7 priority support with guaranteed response times.
addons.details: Dedicated support engineer, 1-hour response time for critical issues, monthly health checks, and priority bug fixes.

addons.name: Additional 10 Users
addons.description: Expand your user count by an additional 10 users.

bundles.name: Cloud Complete
bundles.description: Comprehensive cloud management and security bundle.

bundles.name: Enterprise Management Suite
bundles.description: Complete enterprise solution for cloud management, security, and data protection.
